statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location, value FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, value as sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM model_data WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.75;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name IN ('sensor1', 'sensor2', 'sensor3') ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 40 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING MAX(sensor_value) > 70 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;

SELECT sensor_name, model_name, model_accuracy FROM sensor_data JOIN model_data ON sensor_data.sensor_id = model_data.model_id WHERE sensor_value < 30 AND model_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND data_value > 50;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM deep_learning_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC, model_name;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM deep_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data UNION SELECT * FROM deep_learning_models ORDER BY timestamp ASC, model_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, manufacturer FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, description FROM sensor_metadata WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, label FROM training_data WHERE data_value < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM models WHERE model_type = 'regression' AND model_name LIKE '%linear%';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'Numeric' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, sd.timestamp, sd.data_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE s.location LIKE '%Room%' AND sd.data_value > 50;
SELECT m.model_name, mt.timestamp, mt.accuracy FROM models m JOIN model_training mt ON m.model_id = mt.model_id WHERE m.model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY mt.accuracy DESC;
SELECT mp.model_id, mp.timestamp, mp.prediction_value FROM model_predictions mp JOIN models m ON mp.model_id = m.model_id WHERE m.model_name LIKE '%Linear%' AND mp.prediction_value < 0.5;
